participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and friendly, she finds joy in small things and has a passion for baking.
participant_1.background: I am scared of dying. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I have dogs. I love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, he enjoys life in the country and has a strong connection to his roots.
participant_2.background: I work my parents' farms. I drive a big truck and live in the country. I'm an electrician. I only listen to country music.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
I do like to talk about myself, i've a dogs
I'm fine thanks. Good day for work on my parents' farm.
i started my new job at google last week . where do you work ?
I work as an electrician in a small place in the country side
that life is just as good . you are relaxing after a long life .. Also, try to guess: i am scared ...
Are you scared of driving around your in Prius when working people like me have scary big trucks ?
do you have family to talk you ? mine lives across the country .
Sure, I help on my parents' farm. Sometimes we go listen to country music together.
that would be great , i enjoy listening to music while i'm painting outdoors .. Also, try to guess: i love to ...
eat expensive organic food from a shop where they wouldn't let in a farmer?
have a nice day funny you
i'll thanks , i hope you make it to the west coast some day
